                                 java.lang.String deviceId,

                                 DataLoadListener listener)
Description copied from interface: NotificationDAO
Register device to server for GCM push notification.

Specified by:
registerDevice in interface NotificationDAO
Parameters:
appName - application name.
deviceId - unique id of device
deviceToken - device key genereted by the GCM
deviceType - For now Device Type is always "GCM"
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore
